table.name: vtiger_functionallocations
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_functionallocations` ( `functionallocationsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `functionallocation_name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`functionallocationsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_functionallocationscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_functionallocationscf` ( `functionallocationsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`functionallocationsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
